title: unai dinam
sahitya:
unai dinam paNindadum vINO dEvi umaiyE jagadambA en kuzhavip-paruva mudal


anupallavi

  anaittulagum paDaittaLikkum parAshakti anaiyE
 anaiyE enrunranaiyE ninaindu andi paghal


caraNam    ettanai shOdanai sheidiDinum unadaDi malariNai viDuvEnO
Ishvari nin aruLirukka en manam sancalappaDuvEnO
cittam irangAdO en cintAkulam nIngAdO nAnun
shEi anrO evvuyirkkum nIyE tAi anrO bhuvanasundari nAn
